items.question: What kind of data is required?
items.answer: MQTT topic streams (sensor, event, metrics, etc.)

items.question: Can I deploy it on my systems?
items.answer: Yes ‚Äî we deliver COLIGO lite as a container.

items.question: Do I need historical data first?
items.answer: No ‚Äî streaming learning allows immediate use.

items.question: Do I need special hardware to run COLIGO lite?
items.answer: No. COLIGO lite runs as a container, so it works on standard edge devices, servers, or in the cloud. As long as your system supports containers and MQTT, you're ready to go.
